content: स्फुरणं [स्फुर्-ल्युट्] {@--1@} Throbbing, quivering, trembling (in general). {@--2@} Throbbing or quivering of certain parts of the body (indicating good or bad luck). {@--3@} Breaking forth, arising, starting into view. {@--4@} Gleaming, flashing, glittering, shining, twinkling. {@--5@} Flashing on the mind, crossing the memory.
